description:
WORKS BEST FOR USA, UK, INDIA AND SINGAPORE, SYDNEY & MELBOURNE. Coming soon across the globe!
Join Clingle and discover an amazing new way to share your life's moments with friends and family. Clingle lets you - Check-in with style by adding a live video/audio of the moment, send location based gifts, discover thousands of popular places, deals and discounts in your locality or engage your friends by leaving surprise messages (with video, audio or photos) at various places in your city! Connecting with friends was never this fun and exploring your world was never this exciting!

Introducing VIDEO and AUDIO CHECK-INS!

Say good bye to boring location broadcasts and now record and share your check-in moments as live video/audio! Make your friends aware of where you are and what you're up to by  sharing live video/audio clip of the place you visit! It's the best way to check-in ever!

Now add real world gifts to your Clings!

Choose from gift cards of over 40+ premium brands and attach it to your cling message along with personalized audio/photo or video! It's the best way to send gifts this season or any season! 

Leave surprise messages and make your friends unlock it when they visit a particular place, or start private group conversions about the trip you are planning with friends or share the song that comes to your mind when you visit that special place! Clings are the personal messages which add location to your conversation in any way you wish! Leaving a cling is super fun, unlocking one is even better!! 


The best way to find what's around you! Explore with Clingle!

With millions of places added right out of the box, Clingle lets you explore for popular places, deals and discounts in your neighborhood! Searching for the perfect lunch spot or the coffee shop with a special offer? Need directions to the movie hall or want to find a better place to hang-out? Clingle has suggestions for everything that you would want to do in the city.

Send FREE gifts from iStash store based on your Clingle activities!

Jump in and get active on Clingle and redeem FREE GIFTS that you can share with friends!
releaseNotes:
- Introducing location based gifting -  choose from gift cards of over 40+ premium brands and attach it to your cling message along with personalized audio/photo or video! It's the best way to send gifts this season or any season!
- Send Clings/Gift Clings for Facebook friends
- Send FREE gifts from iStash store based on your Clingle activities
- Enhanced Venue details - Now leave video, audio at a venue and share your experience with the rest of the world
- You & Friends at a Venue - Frequenting a venue with friends? now you get to see all your & your friends past experiences at a venue right from the venue details screen
- Clingle now works in Sydney and Melbourne
- Share your venue experiences on Tumblr
- Enhanced sharing options for Twitter and Facebook
- Design / UI improvements across the app
